TopicTitle: filter for part diameter in constructions

Articles.Content:
Could you please make a sub-filter for the parts in construction or some kind of sorting via diameter

i would like to have a diameter filter for all of the propulsion components (how to handle reduction adapters??) and maybe others.

I'm sorry if this has been done before, but, yes.

And while we're at it perhaps in the 'propulsion' tab have categories for Jets, Rockets and RCS?
Categories for Jets Rockets and RCS would be also good nice thx.
